To clear up any misconceptions:

1)I consider posting programming code to be relevant as long as it 
involves the game gladiator and does not break another rule.  That 
means I do not have an exclusive monopoly on posting code.

2)It is off-limits to post programming code that modifies a saved game 
file.  1st offense equals immediate message moderation for a period of 
time I determine.  This is about protecting the integrity of any 
future tournaments for the game of gladiator.

Hybrid/dual class discussion will start next week.  I will break into 
3 parts, since I consider there are three basic ways to have those 
kind of characters.  Each week, we will discuss one of the ways of 
doing that.

I'd like a show of hands of people who would like to have a version of 
Gladiator:Beyond Freedom, but for various reasons (such as limited 
internet access or slow internet connection) can't download it.  If 
enough people are interested, I would like to set up some sort of 
distribution system to get copies sent out to people.
